name: Figma
title: figma.com
shortDescription: Figma is a versatile interface design tool that allows teams to collaborate in real-time. It integrates design and prototyping in a single place, making it ideal for designers, developers, and product teams. Users can create responsive websites, digital whiteboards, and even use AI features to enhance productivity. An example use case is a design team collaborating on a new app interface, sharing progress and receiving instant feedback.
pros: Extensive AI features for enhanced productivity
cons: Can be overwhelming for new users
Requires internet connection for real-time features
